metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1916 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in tiffcrop, a program distributed by the libtiff package.A specially crafted tiff file can lead to an out-of-bounds read in theextractImageSection function in tools/tiffcrop.c, resulting in a denial ofservice and limited information disclosure. This issue affects libtiffversions 4.x.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
